description: Implement a basic model-based reinforcement learning planning step.

prompts.prompt: Implement the 'model_based_planning' function which simulates a basic model-based reinforcement learning planning step. Though the function does not have any specific parameters or outputs for this task, ensure it returns a non-null value.

In the realm of reinforcement learning, model-based planning plays an essential role in making decisions based on the learned model of the environment. Your task is to design a basic function called 'model_based_planning' that, for the sake of this problem, doesn't take any specific inputs and can return any non-null value. The goal is to represent the skeleton of a model-based RL planning step.
